Package nl.tudelft.jpacman.board

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    A top-down view of a matrix of Squares.
    BoardFactory
    A factory that creates Board objects from 2-dimensional arrays of Squares.
    BoardFactoryTest
    Tests the linking of squares done by the board factory.
    BoardTest
    Test various aspects of board.
    ItemsColorTest
    Tests methods that deal with translating colours to game objects.
    OccupantTest
    Test suite to confirm that Units correctly (de)occupy squares.
    Square
    A square on a Board, which can (or cannot, depending on the type) be occupied by units.
    SquareTest
    Test suite to confirm the public API of Square works as desired.
    Unit
    A unit that can be placed on a Square.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    An enumeration of possible directions on a two-dimensional square grid.
    ItemsColor
    Contains the mapping between pacman items and their corresponding color/letter.
